page.title: 19BROOMY FURLONG FARM
page.content: The farm is an{arable cash crop {farm.}Most of the work is finished by May & crops include{winter wheat, {winter barley & potatoes & 10 acres {of grass}which is grazed by{10 beef {stores. Herbicides and pesticides}are used to keep all crops in perfect condition. In August & early September wheat & barley are harvested. Ploughing is done in October, followed by sowing & drilling. During winter hedges, ditches & machinery are maintained.{The farm is on the edge of {the urban fringe}but there are no problems of damage or conflict with nearby residents. A public footpath crosses the fields and is used by the local secondary school for cross country. Next to the farm is a sewage works, which will soon close as new pipes are being laid.
